TopicTitle: Every challenge needs a Kiddies Table

Articles.Content:
So we have all seen them, those entries for a challenge that don't meet the requirements or the entrant is being deceitful in their entry

I say every challenge poster should have a Kiddies Table division in their challenge just for this ... perhaps if people see this in challenges it will make them read things more closly and also keep the cheats on their toes since its intention is to shame cheaters and those who don't care to read the rules

that's up to the poster's decision and not anyone else, plus their entries are on the thread so really they are not "lost" , the whole "cheater" stuff well if you apply to a challenge and intend to cheat on it it's your problem and honestly why even bother? i dont think anything will be solved by this to the contrary people would be encouraged to push their abilities and knowledge further and further

Disqualification is enough, IMO, no need to humiliate for posterity.

That and some challenges have a separate leaderboard for those who accomplish the task but outside the strict rules.
Thread moved to Kerbal Network, since it's about an aspect of the forum rather than the game.
